title: Ben Everitt – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ben Everitt, the Conservative MP for Milton Keynes North, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content:
We need experience and resilience. In the national interest I am backing Boris Johnson.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
